name: allolib-studio-online
description: Browser-based creative coding environment for AlloLib C++ applications

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=frontend && npm run build --workspace=backend
scripts.desktop:dev: npm run build && cd desktop && npm run dev
scripts.desktop:build: npm run build && cd desktop && npm run build && npm run pack
scripts.desktop:dist: npm run build && cd desktop && npm run build && npm run dist
scripts.desktop:dist:win: npm run build && cd desktop && npm run build && npm run dist:win
scripts.desktop:dist:mac: npm run build && cd desktop && npm run build && npm run dist:mac
scripts.desktop:dist:linux: npm run build && cd desktop && npm run build && npm run dist:linux
